articles.title: Toronto Blue Jays P Kevin Gausman leaves game after being hit on foot by liner
articles.description: Toronto Blue Jays pitcher Kevin Gausman left Game 1 of Saturday's doubleheader against the Tampa Bay Rays after taking a line drive off his right foot.
articles.content:
TORONTO -- Blue Jays right-hander Kevin Gausman left Game 1 of Saturday's doubleheader against Tampa Bay after he was hit in the right foot by a line drive from Rays shortstop Wander Franco.

articles.description: No. 1 Iga Swiatek had her 37-match win streak come to an end with a loss to Alize Cornet in the third round at Wimbledon.

articles.title: Cleveland Cavaliers, Darius Garland agree to five-year rookie extension worth up to $231M, agent says
articles.description: The Cavaliers and All-Star guard Darius Garland have agreed to a five-year, $193 million maximum designated rookie contract extension that could be worth as much as $231 million.
articles.content:
The Cleveland Cavaliers and All-Star guard Darius Garland have agreed to the largest deal in franchise history.

articles.title: Amanda Anisimova ousts Coco Gauff in third round at Wimbledon
articles.description: Amanda Anisimova, the No. 20 seed, has eliminated American Coco Gauff in the third round at Wimbledon and will next face unseeded Frenchwoman Harmony Tan.
articles.content:
American teenager Coco Gauff is out of Wimbledon in the third round after a 6-7 (4), 6-2, 6-1 loss Saturday to Amanda Anisimova on Centre Court.
